# Python bytecode
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Virtual environment
venv/
.env/
env/

# Jupyter Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# VS Code settings
.vscode/

# macOS system files
.DS_Store

# PyCharm settings
.idea/

# Model files
*.joblib
*.pkl

# Logs and cache
*.log
*.cache/
.cache/

# Streamlit cache
.streamlit/

# Environment variables
*.env

# Lottie JSON files (if downloaded locally)
*.json

# OS generated files
Thumbs.db
